name: UnmodifiableCollection_unmodifiableCollectionTest
description: Tests for the UnmodifiableCollection class, specifically focusing on the unmodifiableCollection method.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiableCollectionWithUnmodifiableCollection
test_cases.description: Tests that the unmodifiableCollection method returns an instance of UnmodifiableCollection and that the original collection is not modified.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiableCollectionWithAlreadyUnmodifiableCollection
test_cases.description: Tests that the unmodifiableCollection method returns the same instance when called with an already unmodifiable collection.
